reviewText: I have a three year old who loves Blues Clues. He loves this DVD. It came very fast and he watches it over and over. It was inexpensive and got to my home in no time. I give this seller high ratings because the package was just as it was described.
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School

reviewText: My son enjoys ALL the Blue's Clues dvd's! I enjoy them because they teach so many things; numbers, letters, kindness, feelings, getting along with people, different feelings....
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School

reviewText: For me, to have those on DVD, with Steve whom my 3 year old loves makes this DVD worth the price of admission.  While Joe is pretty good, Steve has a quality that makes preschoolers feel like he is talking just to them!  The ABC's episode is fantastic for a three and up, as a 2 year old, it went above his head, and what they asked them to understand was too much, but now, on DVD he loved it and was able to participate right along -- they need to recognize first letters of words maybe to truly appreciate it.  The 123s episode is wonderful, teaches counting, addition, subtraction, more, haven't even watched the Joe episodes in 3 viewings.
summary: The DVD has the ABC's and 123s VHS as bonus episodes
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School

reviewText: Easy way help children never been to school, going back to school, or even those already attending school what to expect.
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School

reviewText: Love Blues Clues - but this one isn't one of my son's favorites.  We live both Steve and Joe because they each bring something different to the show.
summary: Blues Clues - great learning DVD's - this one is ok - not as good as most
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School

reviewText: My son just discovered Blue and is a great tool in teaching him things such as the alphabet and counting.
Title: Blue's Clues - Blue Takes You to School
